snippet.title: Once Upon a Jester - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Say hello to Once Upon a Jester - our newest diamond in our publishing lineup! Demo available now in the Future Game Show Virtual Show Floor exhibition, full game coming to multiple platforms in 2022!

Embark on an adventure as Jester and Sok - travel the kingdom to improvise theatre shows and perform on stages far and wide. Sing your hearts out, crack jokes and impress audiences to become the stars of the famous Royal Theatrical Spectacle!

Wishlist now and play the demo - available on Steam thanks to the Future Game Show!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1668190/Once_Upon_a_Jester/
